H1.text: Which French painter lived and worked in Tahiti. Claude Monet

H2.text: Which French painter lived and worked in Tahiti. Pierre-Auguste Renoir

H3.text: Which French painter lived and worked in Tahiti. Gaugin

A4.text: He set sail for Tahiti on 1 April 1891, promising to return a rich man and make a fresh start.

A5.text: He arrived in September 1895 and was to spend the next six years living, for the most part, an apparently comfortable life as an artist-colon near, or at times in, Papeete.
